subject: Horse Racing
Breeders' Cup World Thoroughbred Championships
Belmont Stakes
lead_paragraph: From July through October 2007, a new series, the Breeders’ Cup Challenge, will be held. The series will take place at six racetracks and involve 24 of the most prestigious races in the United States.
snippet: From July through October 2007, a new series, the Breeders’ Cup Challenge, will be held. The series will take place at six racetracks and involve 24 of the most prestigious races in the United States.
